Control Name: 1.7.4 Burstable (B) series VM sizes are used for VMs that are idle most of the time and have high usage only in certain periods.
Control Statement: The B-series VMs are ideal for workloads that do not need the full performance of the CPU continuously, like web servers, proof of concepts, small databases and development build environments.
